description: India stands among the top 5 most polluted nations in the world. The picture is pretty bleak now with poor awareness and action levels.

description: The recreational area in LG's office is specially designed, free from particulate matter & pollution with green & nature inspired environs.

description: In India, TGB is co-funding ‘trustea’, the India Sustainable Tea Code that intends to transform 500 million Kg or 50% of Indian tea.
title: Tata Global Beverages aims at sustainable sourcing of tea brands by 2020

description: Maruti has 3086 workshops across 1478 cities, serving 17 million customers and has reduced water consumption by around 500 crore litres per annum.

description: After her video brought justice to 591 HUL employees, she now wants to work towards helping people who suffered the Bhopal Gas Tragedy.
